phrases: Reach out and it will begin!
I have finally made it to the holy land the world's greatest witch, Shiny Chariot, grew up in!
There are not any buses in this town.
It says there is supposed to be a terminal here.
But seriously, this map's way too ambiguous.
Look, I have got a rare card of Chariot!
Chariot's got to be loved over in the magic world.
Nobody else seems to care where I am from.
They ask me if I am still living in the last century.
I tried ordering a magic learning kit online, but it all went over my head.
It was awful with all the tourists everywhere.
Oh, I heard a rumor about the new freshmen.
Geez, they have been letting too many plebeians in recently!
I heard the academy's having financial issues, and cannot keep operating without accepting non-witches.
The leyline connects this location to Luna Nova.
Magic energy has flowed through this leyline since ancient times.
And even if I did, I cannot ride it.
It is the forest of ancient legend.
This is sacred land protected by a magic circle.
A collector of deadly poisons like me cannot ignore such a super rare item.
It is a super rare item a deadly poison collector like me cannot ignore.
It is over, we will not be there in time...
It is over, there is no way we will make it.
Come and catch me if you can!
As you have crossed its threshold once more,
you are expected to act with pride and decorum while maintaining a sense of modesty.
I will now begin the matriculation cere
My word, that was a unprecedented ceremony.
Reach out, and it will begin!
A believing heart is your magic.
This is the holy land the world's greatest witch, Shiny Chariot, grew up in!
This is where I will become a witch!
Could you tell me where the bus stop for Luna Nova is?
It is the school Shiny Chariot went to!
Do you know where I can catch the bus to Luna Nova?
I am looking for a bus stop around here.
We do not have any buses in this town.
It does say there is a terminal here...
But seriously, this map's way too vague.
How am I supposed to find my way with it?
Are you entering Luna Nova too?
Heading to the matriculation ceremony now?
I was feeling kind of lonely about heading to the witch academy all alone.
Ever since I saw Shiny Chariot's magic show when I was six, it is been my dream to become a witch!
Or more like, that is when my fate was decided?
You must know who Shiny Chariot is!
Look, a rare card of Chariot.
I am sure they love Chariot in the magic world.
Where I am from, nobody else really seems to care...
They always ask me if I am stuck in the last decade.
But Chariot's the only witch that amazing, do not you think?
And then there was that moon...
I have never seen it done in real life.
How did you make that magic?
I ordered a magic learning kit online, but I had no idea what to do with it.
I do not even really understand the basics all that well...
But I am hoping to learn the kind of magic Chariot uses in school.
For crying out loud, what is with that girl?
Awful, with all the tourists swarming the place.
Speaking of awful, I heard a rumor about the new students.
It seems one of them is not of witch blood.
Geez, they have been letting too many commoners in recently!
I heard the academy's having financial issues and cannot keep operating without accepting non-witches.
What if she cannot ride a broom?
There has not been a witch in Luna Nova's entire history who could not ride a broom.
I sure hope the bus gets here soon.
Is not this the bus stop?
Do you truly believe a bus would come here?
This location is connected to Luna Nova through a leyline.
Magic energy has flowed through the leylines since ancient times.
You can fly to Luna Nova by riding that energy.
It is common sense to witches!
We will be permanently expelled from the magic world if we are late to matriculation.
Aw man, I am so late!
Mom and Yanne gave me way too many gifts to bring back.
Since I do not recognize you, does that mean you are new?
Luna Nova is really strict about its rules.
Not only will they shut the doors on you if you are late, you will be expelled too.
I do not have a broom.
And even if I did, I could not ride it.
S-Sorry, I do not want to be late.
I have never flown double before, but I might be able to pull it off.
So there are nice witches too!
Be quick, we are running out of time.
I think your luggage is too heavy.
Normal witches are unable to enter the legendary forest of Arcturus.
Please do not tell me you are carrying salt.
But I cannot survive without pickled plum
You are the very definition of trouble.
Something like that will not kill a witch.
I am fine, but my broom is not.
It appears we reached my destination.
I have never seen this forest before.
It is a forest of ancient legend.
This is sacred land, protected by a magic circle.
They say that even witches cannot escape once they have wandered in.
How am I supposed to make matriculation now?
You should worry more about being stuck here your entire life.
Hey, do not scare me like that!
What the heck is that thing?!
It is a mandrake, a poisonous plant.
Will that help us get out?
What did that spell just do?
You said Hey stupid, come eat me if you want to shut me up.
That is a mythical cockatrice which lives only in Arcturus Forest.
They say its feathers contain a deadly poison.
A collector of deadly poisons cannot ignore such a super rare item.
I will grab a feather in the meantime.
Are you saying you used us as bait?!
Shout that line one more time!
You will be petrified if you get caught in its breath.
We have to get out of here.
There is no way we will make it if we keep on wasting time!
It is over, we cannot get there in time...
I am going to be a witch!
Try to catch me if you can!
He does not know when to give up!
We cannot all get away on one broom!
What are they doing in such a place?
Everyone, did you have an enjoyable vacation?
Our academy has raised countless great witches in its long history.
By crossing its threshold once more, you pledged yourself to act with pride, decorum, and a sense of modesty.
Devote yourselves to the study of magic.
Now, we shall commence the matriculation cere
My word, that was an unprecedented ceremony.
It is only due to the headmaster's special permission
that you have been allowed to enroll.
Make certain not to forget your debt.
For the next three years, you three can expect particularly strict instruction.
Here where our long journey has finally led us
Here where our long journey has finally led us
kakedashita hibi ni yukitsuita kono basho
kakedashita hibi ni yukitsuita kono basho
We can push open the door
We can push open the door
In the footsteps of our dreams far beyond the stars
In the footsteps of our dreams far beyond the stars
hoshizora no kanata yume no ashiato
hoshizora no kanata yume no ashiato
Pick up the pieces with a song
Pick up the pieces with a song
Keep the destination of your dreams nestled in your heart
Keep the destination of your dreams nestled in your heart
yume ga kaketeku basho i am about to mo kokoro ni himete
yume ga kaketeku basho i am about to mo kokoro ni himete
The landscape looks like it is burning brilliantly
The landscape looks like it is burning brilliantly
yaketsuita you ni irodzuita fuukei wa
yaketsuita you ni irodzuita fuukei wa
But you cannot see it fallen on the ground
But you cannot see it fallen on the ground
The world will keep on turning
The world will keep on turning
Embrace the moment as if it will never come again
Embrace the moment as if it will never come again
hakanai mama no i am about to wo dakishimete
hakanai mama no i am about to wo dakishimete
Let us keep walking as we are with the light in our sights
Let us keep walking as we are with the light in our sights
kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
kawaranai mama jikan to hikari mitsumete aruiteku
